error.telemetry: Failed to send telemetry data after downloading the application from the SAPUI5 ABAP Repository. {{- error}}
error.qfaJsonNotFound: The {{- jsonFileName }} file was not found in the downloaded application. Ensure the downloaded application is properly deployed to the ABAP repository.
error.replaceWebappFilesError: An error occurred when replacing files in the downloaded application: {{- error}}. For more information, view the logs.
error.applicationListFetchError: An error occurred when fetching the application list: {{- error}}. Check if your application is available in the system.
error.metadataFetchError: An error occurred when fetching metadata: {{- error}}. For more information, view the logs.
error.appConfigGenError: An error occurred when generating the application configuration: {{- error}}. For more information, view the logs.
error.endPhase: An error occurred in the end phase: {{- error}}. For more information, view the logs.
error.errorProcessingJsonFile: An error occurred when processing the JSON file: {{- error}}. Check the file is valid.
error.noAppsDeployed: No applications deployed to this system can be downloaded.

validationErrors.invalidMetadataPackage: Invalid or missing package in the metadata. Check the metadata.
validationErrors.invalidServiceName: Invalid or missing `serviceName` in `serviceBindingDetails`. Check the `serviceName`.
validationErrors.invalidServiceVersion: Invalid or missing `serviceVersion` in `serviceBindingDetails`. Check the `serviceVersion`.
validationErrors.invalidMainEntityName: Invalid or missing `mainEntityName` in `serviceBindingDetails`. Check the `mainEntityName`.
validationErrors.invalidModuleName: Invalid or missing `moduleName` in serviceBindingDetails. Check the `moduleName`.
validationErrors.invalidRepositoryName: Invalid or missing `repositoryName` in `serviceBindingDetails`. Check the `repositoryName`.

installationErrors.npmInstall: An error occurred in the install phase: {{- error}}. For more information, view the logs.
installationErrors.skippedInstallation: `--skipInstall` option was specified. Installation of dependencies will be skipped.

appDownloadErrors.downloadedFileNotBufferError: Error: The downloaded file is not a buffer. Check the file.
appDownloadErrors.appDownloadFailure: An error occurred when downloading the application: {{- error}}. For more information, view the logs.
appDownloadErrors.zipExtractionError: An error occurred when extracting the zip file: {{- error}}. For more information, view the logs.

eventHookErrors.vscodeInstanceMissing: Error: Missing VS Code instance in event hook.
eventHookErrors.commandExecutionFailed: Error executing `postGenCommand` in event hook: {{- error}}

readManifestErrors.manifestFileNotFound: Error: the `manifest.json` file was not found in the downloaded application. Check the file exists.
readManifestErrors.readManifestFailed: Error: Failed to read the `manifest.json` file. Check the file is valid.
readManifestErrors.sapAppNotDefined: Error: `sap.app` not defined in the `manifest.json` file. Check `sap.app` is defined.
readManifestErrors.sourceTemplateNotSupported: Error: Source template not supported. Use a supported template.
readManifestErrors.invalidManifestStructureError: Invalid `manifest.json file` structure: `sap.ui5` or `sap.app` are missing. Check they exist.

quickDeployedAppDownloadErrors.noAppsFound: No application with the ID {{ appId }} was found in the system. Please check if the application is deployed correctly or select another app.
quickDeployedAppDownloadErrors.transportCheckFailed: Transport request resolution failed with error: {error}.

warn.extractedFileNotFound: Extracted file not found: {{- extractedFilePath}}. For more information, view the logs.
warn.requiredFieldsMissing: Required fields are missing for the {{- appId }} application. Check if the application is deployed correctly.

readMe.appDescription: This application was converted from an SAP Fiori application that was deployed from ADT using the ADT Quick Fiori Application generator.
readMe.launchText:
To launch the generated application, run the following command from the generated app root folder:

```
    npm start
```

info.repoAppDownloadCompleteMsg: The selected application has been downloaded and updated to support SAP Fiori tools.
